Author: ingefaer_
Text: me too. i’d rather be cool as fuck with a normal body, than be small and weird and hangry, and that helps me eat and be “normal”.   developing an interest in maintaining the self and identity outside of the ED has been such a good recovery point for me & i think a lot of people would find it comforting.

Author: fuuwuu
Text: Love this! The idea that our lives will be fun and meaningful once we hit some arbitrary weight is such bullshit- the people in my life I want to be like didn’t get where they are by starving obviously! They actually believe they have worth and apply themselves to things they are passionate about. I hope I can get to a similar place as you OP! Keep killing it.
